# [CHECKLIST TYPE] Checklist: [FEATURE NAME]

**Purpose**: [Brief description of what this checklist covers]
**Created**: [DATE]
**Feature**: [Link to spec.md or relevant documentation]

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Constitution Compliance (Required for all features)

| Principle | Status | Evidence |
|-----------|--------|----------|
| I. API-First Design | ⬜ | Endpoints in `src/routes/*.ts` |
| II. Module Isolation | ⬜ | Module in `/public/js/modules/[name]/` |
| III. API Client Pattern | ⬜ | Uses `createModuleAPI()` |
| IV. Full-Screen UI Only | ⬜ | No modal classes, breadcrumbs present |
| V. Premium UI Standards | ⬜ | Uses `.module-header-premium`, design tokens |
| VI. Multi-Tenant Isolation | ⬜ | organizationId in all queries |
| VII. Simplicity & YAGNI | ⬜ | Single-file or justified multi-file |
